responses.rationale: The segment reports a planned action (culling) but contains no explicit calming language or intensified low-risk evaluation.
The segment reports a negative fact (deaths of turkeys) but contains no explicit calming language or intensified low-risk evaluation.
Mentions 'rare' but lacks an intensifier ('very rare', 'extremely low risk') required for the intensified low-risk cue in Q5.
Reports absence of cases in Americans and worldwide figures, but lacks explicit calming language or intensified low-risk evaluation.
